name: Tag
subtitle: The ultimate friend-tagging game on Farcaster
description: Play the classic game of tag with your Farcaster friends! Tag people in the app or by mentioning @tag in your casts. Race to untag yourself quickly and climb the leaderboard. The faster you tag someone else, the more points you earn!
tagline: Tag your friends, climb the leaderboard!
